alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Roosevelt County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; Union County; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 6:04AM MDT until April 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central, northeast, southeast, and west central New Mexico. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from Noon today to 9 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
